04 April 2025 - less than 1 min read time
Tags: Figma

Remediating Kell (2015)

As part of our Writing Across Media 303 group project, we created a multimodal response to Kell’s 2015 paper. The project explored how meaning moves across contexts and through material and semiotic forms. We chose to express our interpretation through an interactive website prototype designed in Figma, focusing on themes such as materiality, agency, and resemiotization.

This site reimagines Kell’s key arguments as a visual and interactive experience, mapping how meanings are remediated across different media.
